system.description:
This tactical gear is covered in MOLLE, which allows different accessories to be mounted according to the user’s specifications. the MOLLE vest is also printed in camouflage patterns: woodland, desert, winter, urban (gray patterned), and black are available. When worn in an appropriate setting, and is all matching, it grants a +2 bonus on Stealth checks. This armor has 12 MOLLE slots, but they can be removed at time of purchase for no cost.

Special Notes

This Armor can accept a single set of Armor Plates.
